  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92897</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92897</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Orbites planétaires</string>
            <string language="en">Planetary orbits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planetarische Bahnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbitas planetárias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbite planetarie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλανητικές τροχιές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órbitas planetarias</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce graphisme et ce tableau  illustrent les différentes périodes de l'orbite des neuf planètes  dans le système solaire. La distance de chaque planète à partir du  soleil est également montrée.</string>
            <string language="en">These graph and table illustrate the different periods of orbit of the nine planets in the Solar System.  The distance of each planet from the Sun is also shown.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">distance</string>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">période</string>
            <string language="en">period</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planète</string>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement planétaire</string>
            <string language="en">planetary motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese stellen graphisch dar und Tabelle 
veranschaulichen die unterschiedlichen Perioden der Bahn der neun 
Planeten im Solarsystem. Der Abstand jedes Planeten von der 
Sonne wird auch gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes representam graficamente e a tabela ilustra
os períodos diferentes da órbita dos nove planetas no sistema solar.
A distância de cada planeta do sol é mostrada também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi rappresentano graficamente e la tabella 
illustra i periodi differenti dell'orbita dei nove pianeti nel sistema
solare. La distanza di ogni pianeta dal sole egualmente è 
indicata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτοί δίνουν με γραφική παράσταση και ο πίνακας 
επεξηγεί τις διαφορετικές περιόδους τροχιάς των εννέα πλανητών 
στο ηλιακό σύστημα. Η απόσταση κάθε πλανήτη από τον ήλιο 
εμφανίζεται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstos representan gra'ficamente y el vector 
ilustra los diversos períodos de la órbita de los nueve planetas en 
la Sistema Solar. La distancia de cada planeta del sol también 
se muestra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Periode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planetarische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">distância</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">período</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planeta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento planetário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περίοδος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
